post:
Hostpoco is Fast, Secure, Affordable and Powerful VPS Provider.Our main goal is to provide best quality servers at the lowest possible rate with great customer support. We're deploying premium Intel Xeon servers with full-SSD / HDD storage in premium data centers connected to redundant Tier 1 internet providers. Our fast servers come with a 24/7 super-fast technical support service. Also all our vps hosting plans comes with full root access, dedicated IP, free RDNS and free re-installations.

Each SSD VPS plan comes with following features:

~Complete Root Access

~VPS Type OpenVZ
~Free Setup
~99 % Uptime Guarantee
~24/7 Live Support
~SSH Access
~Additional IP address
~cPanel/whm License
~1 IPv4 included (all ports open)
